title: New Converse ad: Shoes Are Boring, Wear Sneakers - font ID
content:
Of course this is properly a custom font, but it is based on a existing font, anyone know which one?  
I thought Heroic Condensed, but the (') doesn't match and it seems a bit different.

[http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vsD7fGxNa2Q/UBFFWBvxVcI/AAAAAAAAE0s/QjOru7VJAmU/s1600/converse.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093850/http:/4.bp.blogspot.com/-vsD7fGxNa2Q/UBFFWBvxVcI/AAAAAAAAE0s/QjOru7VJAmU/s1600/converse.jpg)
author: K.P.

comments.content: Can't find a font that could match all design specifications (more at converse.com). So, here are only similars (as Heroic Condensed): [Trump Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic) (matching almost everything from /G, /K, /R to /M and /W except /J), [Rama Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/rama-gothic) (overall design looks OK but everything is almost off)
